pr_title: Fix the parsing issue in large post request for transport-simple-http

timeline.message:
Fix the parsing issue in large post request for transport-simple-http
Please refer to #1253
for compatible with Content-Length use InputerStream instead of Reader

timeline.bodyText: The content length here is wrong when the message contains non-ASCII characters (e.g. Chinese characters). Maybe we should use message.getBytes().length instead?
